About Me

Passionate about building technology that makes a difference

I'm a Web Designer and DevOps Architect with a passion for creating beautiful, functional static websites that combine aesthetic excellence with technical precision.

With a background spanning from classical music composition to enterprise-level DevOps architecture, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise to every project. My journey through Universidad Latina (Computer Science) and extensive experience with AWS infrastructure has shaped my approach to building cost-effective, scalable, and visually stunning web solutions.

I believe in "Design is not just what it looks like – design is how it works" – every element should be beautiful, functional, and optimized for performance and user experience.

Education

Universidad Latina, Computer Science

Music Background

Classical composition and musical theory expertise

Global Perspective

Italian-Costa Rican dual citizenship, remote-first approach

Personal Mission

Creating beautiful, accessible websites with cost-effective hosting solutions
